text: Hello friends - I'm JiangHang, a first-year graduate school student, majoring in computational mathematics in China. I want to sign up for the GSoC working for the Julia open-source library.  I would like to know how to find a mentor, and where's their information?

elements.text: Hello friends - I'm JiangHang, a first-year graduate school student, majoring in computational mathematics in China. I want to sign up for the GSoC working for the Julia open-source library.  I would like to know how to find a mentor, and where's their information?

text: Look at the project list listed on the channel description, then send a direct message here on slack to mentors you are interested in working with
